Returns: result containing the status of the request
Parameters: an existing GoogleApiClient. It does not need to be connected at the time of this call, but the read result will be delayed until the connection is complete.
name of the data type we want to read
readDataType(com.google.android.gms.comm.Description: Returns a data type with the specified dataTypeName. Useful to retrieve shareable data types added by other apps or custom data types added by your app. Custom data types created by other apps will not be returned.
readDataType(com.google.android.gms.comm.FullName: public abstract PendingResult<DataTypeResult> readDataType (GoogleApiClient client, String dataTypeName)

Returns: result containing the status of the request
Parameters: an existing GoogleApiClient. Must be connected at the time of this call.
disableFit(com.google.android.gms.common.Description: Disables Google Fit for an app. Can be used to revoke all granted OAuth access permissions from an app and consequently remove all existing subscriptions and registrations of the app.

Returns: a pending result containing the status of the request. If an existing DataType has the same name but different fields, the operation will fail with @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#FitnessStatusCodes#CONFLICTING_DATA_TYPE_E@. If application package name does not match @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataType_E@'s name, the operation will fail with @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#FitnessStatusCodes#INCONSISTENT_DATA_TYPE_E@ status code.
Parameters: an existing GoogleApiClient. Must be connected at the time of this call.
the new data type name and fields that need to be added
createCustomDataType(com.google.android..Description: Defines a new data type which is added to the Google Fit platform on behalf of the current application. Useful for adding a private custom data type for recording app-specific data. Custom data created by one app will not be visible to other apps. Example:
createCustomDataType(com.google.android..FullName: public abstract PendingResult<DataTypeResult> createCustomDataType (GoogleApiClient client, DataTypeCreateRequest request)

ClassDesc: API for accessing custom data types and settings in Google Fit. Custom @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataType_E@ definitions can be added and then retrieved using @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#ConfigApi#createCustomDataType_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#ConfigApi#readDataType_E@. @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#ConfigApi#disableFit_E@ can be used to disconnect your app from Google Fit. The Config API should be accessed via the @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#Fitness_E@ entry point. Example:
